name: snappy-library
description: Snappy is a compression/decompression library. It does not aim for maximum compression, or compatibility with any other compression library; instead, it aims for very high speeds and reasonable compression
prepare_command:
cp snappy-stubs-public.h.in snappy-stubs-public.h

    sed -i '' 's/@ac_cv_have_stdint_h@/1/g' snappy-stubs-public.h
    sed -i '' 's/@ac_cv_have_stddef_h@/1/g' snappy-stubs-public.h
    sed -i '' 's/@ac_cv_have_sys_uio_h@/1/g' snappy-stubs-public.h

    major=$(echo 1.1.2 | cut -d. -f1)
    minor=$(echo 1.1.2 | cut -d. -f2)
    patch=$(echo 1.1.2 | cut -d. -f3)

    sed -i '' "s/@SNAPPY_MAJOR@/$major/g" snappy-stubs-public.h
    sed -i '' "s/@SNAPPY_MINOR@/$minor/g" snappy-stubs-public.h
    sed -i '' "s/@SNAPPY_PATCHLEVEL@/$patch/g" snappy-stubs-public.h
